author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Veluswamy (62), an apparel exporter, has been elected as State council member of Confederation of Indian Industry (CII).

Mr. Veluswamy, a founder member of Tirupur Exporters Association, was chairman of CII (Tirupur district council).

He ventured into the apparel business about 40 years back catering to domestic market in the initial years. In 1986, he became an exporter of knitwear products to European countries.

Mr. Veluswamy was district governor of Lions Club International District 324 B5.
title: Elected to CII
